title: Personal
description: A simple personal website portfolio for individuals, freelancers, or small businesses to showcase their work and contact information.

title: E Commerce
description: Complete online store solution with product management, shopping cart, payment processing, and order management.

title: CMS
description: Custom content management system for dynamic websites with easy content updates and management capabilities.

title: Resume CV
description: Professional online resume and curriculum vitae with interactive elements and downloadable PDF version.

title: Company
description: Corporate website for businesses with company information, services, team profiles, and contact details.

title: Restaurant
description: Restaurant website with menu display, online reservations, food ordering, and gallery of dishes.

title: Gym
description: Fitness center website with class schedules, membership plans, trainer profiles, and booking system.

title: Hotel Booking
description: Hotel reservation system with room availability, booking management, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

title: Learning Platform
description: Online education platform with course management, video lessons, quizzes, and student progress tracking.

title: Car Rental
description: Car rental service website with vehicle inventory, booking system, pricing calculator, and fleet management.

title: Clinic
description: Medical clinic website with appointment scheduling, patient portal, doctor profiles, and service information.

title: Inventory Management
description: Inventory tracking system with stock management, reporting, supplier management, and order processing.
